page.title: 16OUR HOMES IN DAVIOT.
page.content: There are no housing estates in Daviot.Most houses are quite far from any others. There are ten families in school and five of them live in houses that are about one hundred years old and the other five families live in houses that have been built in the last ten years.All the houses have quite big gardens and they all have three or more bedrooms.Some of the homes have five or six bedrooms and they do 'Bed and Breakfast' for the tourists. One house in Daviot used to be the old Post Office and a shop but it is just a home now. There are no shops in Daviot,just a 'phone box and a pillar box.One family live in the station master's house,which is not needed now as the station is closed.
